subject: Order
description_text:
So why does this still say maintenance supervisor? And still have the address going to greenway and not the billing address? What’s it gonna take to get this correct ? Send to Jeff 8639 west meadow DR peoria az 85382       


From Jeff Gibson

conversations.body_text: Hi Jeff Gibson,    Please don't worry—we did indeed ship to the billing address, but the order information in our backend was not updated.
